message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in my product. I'm happy to offer it to you for $20,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and what it can do for your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and what I can get out of it for my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $17,000 to find a middle ground. This offer reflects the value I'm confident it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still not sure that's the right price for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value and what I can get out of it for my business.
